facts: Hello is a common greeting.
Hi is an informal way to greet someone.
Hey can be used to get someone's attention.
A dog is a domesticated mammal.
Cats purr when they are happy.
Birds have feathers and can usually fly.
Fish live in water and breathe through gills.
Elephants are the largest land animals.
Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius.
The Earth revolves around the Sun.
Gravity pulls objects toward the center of the Earth.
Photosynthesis is how plants make food from sunlight.
Electricity is the flow of electrons.
Mount Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
The Amazon River is the largest river by discharge volume.
Africa is the second largest continent.
Australia is both a country and a continent.
The Sahara is the largest hot desert.
The pyramids of Egypt are ancient structures.
The first man on the moon was Neil Armstrong.
World War II ended in 1945.
The Roman Empire was a powerful ancient civilization.
The Great Wall of China was built to protect against invasions.
Two plus two equals four.
A triangle has three sides.
Pi is approximately 3.14159.
A square has four equal sides.
Multiplication is repeated addition.
A computer processes information using binary code.
The internet connects computers worldwide.
A smartphone is a portable device that combines a phone and a computer.
Artificial intelligence is the simulation of human intelligence by machines.
Wi-Fi allows devices to connect to the internet wirelessly.
Pizza is an Italian dish with cheese and tomato sauce.
Apples are a type of fruit.
Carrots are orange vegetables.
Bread is made from flour, water, and yeast.
Chocolate is made from cocoa beans.
